content.rendered:
Our Mission

Grounding the benefits of the swallow's-nest ecosystem for Indonesia and the World.

Our Vision

To be the Market Leader in the Swallow-Nest Industry in the World by 2030.

Our Focus

To be the Market Leader in the Swallow-Nest Industry in the World by 2030.

Our Integration of

Solution

Edu Tech

Technology IoT and Traceability

Manufacturing

Our History

A brief history of Markas Walet

2019
Start and Release
  • Idea Created
  • Team Formed
  • Marketing Channel Created
2020
Manufacture Run & Legal Created
  • Legal of PT LAN
  • 50 Labour
  • 5 Birdnest House Registered
2021
Network Scaling & Export Quantity
  • 25 Workshop Done
  • 300 Acquisition Farmers
  • 3 Ton Quantity Permitted
2022
Tech Development & Sustainable Growth
  • Application & IoT Launched
  • 8 Birdnest House has been Built
2023 - 2025
Export to China & FMCG
  • Own 5,4 Ton Quantity
  • Launch New Product for Local Market Direct to Customer

Our Founder

Directors of Markas Walet

M Fairuzzuddin Zuhair

Chief Executive Officer

27 Years Old

Educational Background :

Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics from Airlangga University with a GPA of 3.1

Work Experience :

  • Digital Marketing Manager at Vido Garmen Indonesia
  • Commissioner at Omnifit Solusi Nusantara
  • Professional Mentor at DPPKKA, Airlangga University
  • Professional Mentor at BPRBIN, Airlangga University

Achievements :

  • Outstanding Graduate Awardee of Airlangga University in 2019
  • Bronze Medalist of PKM KC PIMNAS 32 by the Ministry of Research, Technology, and Higher Education
  • Awardee of 300 Million Startup Inovasi Indonesia in 2020

Organizational Experience :

  • Vice Chairman of the Executive Board of Airlangga University’s Student Council in 2018
  • Chairman of SMERTA OSPEK at Airlangga University in 2017
  • Chairman of the Semi-Autonomous Body BETA FST UNAIR in 2016
  • Head of the Boarding Department of PESMA Baitul Hikmah in 2016

Maulana Satria Aji

Chief Business Development

27 Years Old

Educational Background :

Bachelor’s degree in Public Health from Airlangga University with a GPA of 3.4

Work Experience :

  • Fundraiser at the NGO Yayasan Seribu Senyum
  • Professional Mentor for Leadership at Ikatan Pelajar Muhammadiyah SMA Muhammadiyah 1 Surabaya
  • Bawaslu 2019

Achievements :

  • Airlangga Leadership Outbound Student
  • Best Poster Conference on Tobacco Control
  • Awardee of 300 Million Startup Inovasi Indonesia in 2020

Organizational Experience :

  • CO-FOUNDER of Komunitas Pelajar Mengajar Surabaya.
  • Vice President of Airlangga University’s Student Council in 2019.
  • Minister of Community Service of Airlangga University’s Student Council in 2018.
  • Chairman of the Social Community Service Division of Ikatan Mahasiswa Muhammadiyah Surabaya.
  • Chairman of the Advocacy Division of Ikatan Pelajar Muhammadiyah Surabaya

Muhammad Taufiqul Yakin

Chief Financial Officer

27 Years Old

Educational Background :

  • Bachelor’s degree in Accounting from Universitas Airlangga (GPA 3.61)
  • Master’s degree in Financial Management from Universitas Indonesia (ongoing)

Work Experience :

Research Assistant at the Faculty of Economics and Business at Airlangga University

Achievements :

LPDP Awardee 2022 PK-189

Organizational Experience :

  • Chairman of the Accounting Student Association, Airlangga University, 2017
  • Finance Minister of the Student Executive Board, Airlangga University, 2018
  • Chairman of the Institute of Chartered Accountants in England and Wales (ICAEW) Student Community, 2017-2019
  • Chairman of the National Congress of Indonesian Accounting Students (KNMAI), 2019

M Haqqi Hudan Maulana

Chief Marketing Officer

27 Years Old

Educational Background :

Bachelor’s degree in Management from Universitas Brawijaya

Work Experience :

  • Marketing Campaign Associate at PT Alami Fintek Sharia
  • Marketing Communication Support at Grab Indonesia

Achievements :

  • Best 10 Paper at Hokkaido International Student Conference on Social Sciences (HISAS) in Japan
  • Awardee of Bakti BCA

Organizational Experience :

  • National Presidium of the Indonesian Islamic Economics Students Association (FOSSEI) 2018-2019
  • Chief of Research and Development at FOSSEI 2016-2017
  • Chief of Research and Development at the Center for Islamic Economics Studies 2016-2017

M Alifuddin Firmansyah

Chief Design Officer

24 Years Old

Educational Background :

Bachelor’s degree in Japanese Studies from Airlangga University

Work Experience :

Media staff of HAI Unair in 2018

Achievements :

Winner of Student Entrepreneurship Program 2020

Organizational Experience :

  • Head of Media and Journalist Division of Unair Football Club in 2017
  • Communication and Information staff of the Japanese Studies Student Association at Airlangga University in 2018

Dany Ali Syafii

Chief Product Development

- Years Old

Educational Background :

Bachelor’s degree in Anthropology from Airlangga University (GPA 3.15)
